name: San Cristobal (No Cubano) - Revelation - Odyssey
additionalNotes: San Cristobal cigars are blended by legendary cigar-maker, Jose ‘Pepin’ Garcia in Estelí, Nicaragua. Handcrafted from the finest, aged premium Nicaraguan tobaccos, San Cristobal features a rich and perfectly versatile collection of blends that highlight milder, medium-bodied, as well as more full-bodied profiles. An exquisite variety of aged wrappers delivers tremendous flavors of cedar, earth and dark chocolate alongside Pepin’s rich signature of spices. Impeccable complexity, countless top-ratings, elegant construction and indulgent finishes continue to endear true enthusiasts everywhere to San Cristobal cigars.
